servinfo.title: Engine has no power
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:M16A and J20A and Engine Basic Inspection:M16A and J20A .

ptxt.intxref: Ignition Coil Assembly (Including ignitor) Inspection:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Leaks, loose connection or disconnection of high-tension cord (for M16A engine)

ptxt.intxref: High-Tension Cord Removal and Installation (M16A):M16A and J20A
DTC P0327 / P0328: Knock Sensor Circuit Low / High:M16A and J20A
Fuel Pump and Its Circuit Check:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Air drawn in through intake manifold gasket or throttle body gasket
Poor performance of ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection:M16A and J20A or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Inspection:M16A and J20A

ptxt.intxref: Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

ptxt.intxref: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection:M16A and J20A
Fuel Injector Circuit Check:M16A and J20A

action.ptxt: Condition “Dragging brakes” in Brakes Symptom Diagnosis
Condition “Slipping clutch” in Clutch (Hydraulic Type) Symptom Diagnosis

ps.ptxt: Camshaft position control (VVT) system out of order (for M16A engine)
Faulty intake manifold tuning vacuum solenoid valve (for J20A engine)

ptxt.intxref: Vacuum Tank Assembly Inspection (J20A):M16A and J20A
